yerevan.#mp1: The heart, the capital of Armenia, Yerevan, the plan of which was designed by architect Alexander Tamanyan, is one of the safest cities in the world. Its sister cities are Los Angeles, Riga, Sao Paulo, Isfahan, Volgograd, Odessa, etc. Tour operators as well as the Municipality suggest tours in Yerevan, on a big red bus, walking, travel group or private. Holidays in Yerevan are full of new information and leisure, since all the streets, monuments, buildings have a history or story to tell.

english.#aAp1: Armenia ‚Äì acknowledged as one of the cradles of civilization ‚Äì is a beautiful country with a long and cultured history. It is an intriguing tourist destination and is recognised as one of the most safe countries in the world. Numerous monuments and masterpieces of the Ancient Era and Middle Ages can be found throughout the country!

english.#au_cardp1: TIA has been operating successfully in the Armenian tourism market since 2011. The company organizes internal, inbound and outbound tours. Our agency specializes in organizing tours and excursions in Armenia, Nagorno-Karabakh, Georgia and Georgia
english.#au_cardp2: We are a team of enthusiastic professionals who believe in the success of a job done with love, and we love the work we do
english.#au_cardp3: In 2019, we were recognized as the best travel company of the year, according to the Armenia Touristicheskaya Awards
english.#au_cardp4: Our goal is to make Armenia an attractive tourist center in the world:
english.#au_cardp5: Direct  Open Communication Rapid Response Teamwork Flexibility  Willingness to Accept Changes Proper Risk Calculation Quality Assurance
english.#au_cardp6: We strive to be an innovative, guiding tour operator, to show a creative approach at every stage of the journey, to occupy our position in the market among the best travel agencies, and to be recognized due to our professionalism and high quality
english.#au_cards4: At the heart of our tours are your desires. We provide our customers with a wide range of services, such as:
english.#au_cardp7:
Educational tours excursions to historic places in Armenia
Individual tours

Kitchen tours Active tourism adventure tours
Entertainment tours

High quality transport services, etc
